title: Does Del Toro Have the Climbing Legs? Historically Hard Final Week of Giro d’Italia Puts Pink Jersey in Peril
content:
Giro week three primer: Can unproven climber Del Toro fend off the mountain veterans in brutal finale and its 20,000 meters of mountain ascent?

Read the full article at Does Del Toro Have the Climbing Legs? Historically Hard Final Week of Giro d’Italia Puts Pink Jersey in Peril on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
